archimate:BusinessObject.name: FlowDomain
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: "This object class represents a network grouping of zero or more Matrix Flow Domains (MFDs) and zero or more Connectionless Port Termination Points (CPTPs) that are assigned to these MFDs. See R_TMF518_NRF_I_0049 and R_TMF518_NRF_I_0050."
